heisigComment: * As a primitive, this character can either retain its meaning of white or take the more graphic meaning of a white bird or dove. This latter stems from the fact that it appears at the top of the kanji for bird, which we shall get to later (Frame 2091).
heisigStory: The color white is a mixture of all the primary colors, both for pigments and for light, as we see when a prism breaks up the rays of the sun. Hence, a single drop of sun spells white.
koohiiStory1: A white ray is a drop of sun.
koohiiStory2: Even a small drop (´) of the sun (日) would make you see nothing but white.
readingExamples: 白髪 (しらが), 紅白 (こうはく), 明白 (めいはく), 白 (しろ), 白い (しろ.い)
words: white or grey hair, trendy hair bleaching
